articles.author: Andy Naylor
articles.title: Brighton receive PGMOL apology after being denied penalty at Tottenham - The Athletic
articles.description:
Brighton and Hove Albion have received an apology from the PGMOL after they were denied a penalty in their 2-1 defeat at Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday.
Brighton appealed for a spot-kick in the second-half of the game at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium when Pier…
